short_summary: Supply of electrical & electronic equipment repair services for the Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) - Central Region.  The work involves providing services to repair CCG vessels
description: The purpose of this Request for Standing Offer is to establish a standing offer for the supply of repair services, on an as-and-when-requested basis, for the following types of equipment: *Shipboard Electrical & Electronic Equipment - Repair, Overhaul, Modification, Maintenence & Calibration. The repair services will be provided for the CCG Vessels, to the geographic area defined by the Central Region, West geographical area - Province of Ontario, service areas covered under this Standing Offer extends from the western port of Kenora in Ontario to the eastern port of Prescott in Ontario.
tags: Shipboard Electrical & Electronic Equipment - repair, overhaul, modification and maintenance.

full_summary:
# Electrical and Electronic Work Retrieval and Repair Services

### Government Tender Announcement

### Details

**Solicitation Number**: F2599-220008/A
**Reference Number**: PW-ML-066-28871
**Amendment**: Amendment Number 1
**Tender Status**: Expired

### Contract Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Public Works and Government Services Canada
	+ Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada
	+ Contact Name: Daniel Durocher
	+ Contact Email: [daniel.durocher@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:daniel.durocher@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
	+ Contact Phone: (873) 455-3877
* **End User Entities**: Fisheries and Oceans Canada
	+ Address: 200 Kent St, Station 13E228, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0E6, Canada

### Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) Details

* **Tender Description**: The Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) - Central Region requires troubleshooting and repair services for electrical and electronic systems on CCG vessels. Services will be provided at the Contractor’s facilities, bases/warehouses, and onboard the CCG vessels within the Province of Ontario.
* **Duration**: The contract period will be from the date of Standing Offer to December 31st, 2023, with an option to extend for two periods of one year.
* **Trade Agreement**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Limited to Canadian Goods and Services**: Yes

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Solicitation Invitation**: All interested suppliers may submit a bid
* **Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement**: No

### Tender Documents

The following documents are attached to this tender announcement:
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/02/509e5cc2debe5189e143ab9fc2fce022/ABES.PROD.PW__ML.B066.E28871.EBSU000.PDF
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/19/c81fddc12d7092d41a3d459338caa155/ABES.PROD.PW
